summary: DEATH WOBBLE OR STEERING OSCILLATION.  HITTING ROUGH PAVEMENT OR BUMP OR 45 CAN CAUSE THE FRONT END TO WOBBLE UNCONTROLLABLY.  I WAS DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY AT 75 MPH WHEN IT FIRST OCCURRED.  IT HAPPENED SEVERAL TIMES AFTER THAT AT THE SAME SPEED BEFORE MY APPT. WITH THE DEALER.  I TOOK THE VEHICLE TO FORD FOR REPAIR.  THE REPLACED THE STEERING DAMPER BUT DID NOTHING ELSE.  THE PROBLEM THEN OCCURRED AGAIN APROXIMATELY 1 MONTH LATER.  I HAVE ANOTHER APPT. WITH THEN NEXT WEEK.  THEY WANT ME TO RIDE WITH THEM.  APPARENTLY THEY DON'T BELIEVE ME THAT IT HAPPENED AGAIN.
